name: Love is Blind - Blind Fall
description:
Go though the world till you win or lose, many things are trying to kill you but the love of our couple is so strong that they will succeed!

A game that feature a loving couple who partakes in a grand adventure to visit the male protagonist loving grandmother to celebrate her 90th birthday. The couple need to go through different areas such as the spooky woods, the dangerous city etc. They live really far away. We aim for 3 levels but 1 amazing level is also fine if we don't have time

Developed by: Peter, stampycaunthe1, Daigo, yannic_2005 and Jean.
